title: Calpers Boosts Venture, Growth Investments in PE Overhaul
description: California Public Employees’ Retirement System, the biggest US public pension fund, is deploying more money to fast-growing and early-stage companies as part of a broader revamp of its private equity portfolio.
content: California Public Employees’ Retirement System, the biggest US public pension fund, is deploying more money to fast-growing and early-stage companies as part of a broader revamp of its private equity portfolio.
